description: Try our easy to follow Beef & Capsicum Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Egg free,Quick & easy lunch,Beef
name: Beef & Capsicum Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 red capsicums, deseeded, cut into 23cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: To make the marinade, combine 2tbs miso, 1 tbs mirin, 1 tbs grated ginger, 1 tbs soy sauce, 1 tsp sesame oil and 1 tsp ground pepper in a shallow dish.
Add beef to marinade and turn to coat. Cover and chill for at least 2 hours or overnight.

Preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over mediumhigh heat. Thread beef, capsicum and onion, alternating, onto 8 skewers. Brush with oil. Cook skewers for 6-8 minutes, turning and brushing with marinade, or until slightly charred and cooked through. Transfer to a plate and set aside to rest, lightly covered with foil, for 5 minutes. Serve skewers sprinkled with sesame seeds and coriander.
